remarks: Define the set of gaussian integers, which are complex numbers whose real and imaginary parts are integers.  (Note that the ` [ _i ] ` is actually part of the symbol token and has no independent meaning.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2014.)
statement: df-gz $p |- Z[i] = { x e. CC | ( ( Re ` x ) e. ZZ /\ ( Im ` x ) e. ZZ ) } $.
